final_mermaid_code:
graph TD
    subgraph "Warehouse & Distribution - ERP System"
        A[Purchase order received] --> B[Check stock availability]
        B --> C{Stock availability}
        C -->|Product in stock| D[Retrieve product from warehouse]
        C -->|Product not in stock| E[Notify unavailability to customer]
        E --> F[Order unfulfilled due to unavailability]
        D --> G[Check raw materials availability]
        G -->|Materials unavailable| E
        G -->|Materials available| H[Suppliers catalog]
        H --> I[Purchase order]
    end

    subgraph "Warehouse & Distribution"
        I --> J[Raw materials order list]
        J --> K{ParallelGateway}
        K --> L1[Request raw materials from Supplier 1]
        K --> L2[Request raw materials from Supplier 2]
        L1 --> M1[Obtain raw materials from Supplier 1]
        L2 --> M2[Obtain raw materials from Supplier 2]
        M1 --> N[Manufacture product]
        M2 --> N
        N --> O[Purchase order]
        O --> P[Request shipping address]
        P --> Q[Get shipping address]
        Q --> R[Ship product]
        R -->|1 week| S[Orders DB]
        R --> T[Handle product return]
        T --> U[Ship/Invoice canceled]
    end

    subgraph "Sales"
        A1[Order inquiry received] --> B1[Handle order inquiry]
        B1 --> C1[Order inquiry handled]

        D1[Order cancelation request received] --> E1[Determine cancelation penalty]
        E1 --> F1[Notify penalty to customer]
        F1 -->|48 hours| G1{XORGateway}
        G1 -->|Stop cancelation request received| H1[Order not canceled]
        G1 -->|Continue cancelation| I1[Cancel order]
        I1 --> J1[Order canceled]
        J1 --> K1[Charge penalty to customer]
        K1 --> L1[Order unfulfilled due to customer cancelation]
        L1 --> M1[Reimburse customer]
    end

    subgraph "Warehouse & Distribution"
        O --> N1[Emit invoice]
        N1 --> O1[Receive payment]
        O1 -->|Order canceled| P1[Order unfulfilled due to customer cancelation]
        O1 --> Q1[Order fulfilled]
    end

    subgraph "Sales"
        O --> R1[Confirm order]
        R1 -->|Order confirmed| S1[Emit invoice]
        R1 -->|Order not confirmed| T1[Escalate order confirmation]
        T1 --> U1[Order confirmation escalated]
        U1 --> V1[Handle escalated confirmation]
    end
